author: delizmahon
title: Fine hotel; convenient location
text: I have stayed here on several occasions for business. Very comfortable and quiet, although the water pressure is extremely high (ie, don't turn on the shower at full blast and be fully awakened if flushing the toilet in the middle of the night). The hotel offers a discounted breakfast at the adjacent restaurant, Nice Matin, which was fine but at my last visit I opted for the neighborhood bagel joints, of which there are many delicious options. Can't really comment on the price of the room as hotel was prepaid.
